long_description: The STM Grip 2 case carries and helps protect your iPad Air in sleek and svelte style. 2 kickstand settings and a wide stance create ideal low and high angles and a stable base for typing and viewing. Front cover automatically wakes your iPad Air when opened and puts it to sleep when closed. Snap-in, hard-shell back and soft lining help protect your device from scratches and bumps; grippy texture has a great feel in your hand and offers a secure hold. The STM Grip 2 case ensures easy access to to the ports and controls on your iPad Air.
short_description: The STM Grip 2 case carries and helps protect your iPad Air in sleek and svelte style. 2 kickstand settings and a wide stance create ideal low and high angles and a stable base for typing and viewing.
